**Project Overview**
Defense Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified firms to submit Abbreviated Proposals for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) to provide professional services for the Department of National Defence (DND) in the National Capital Region. The services include reviewing scientific and engineering studies.

**Contract Details**

* Contract Period: March 31st 2025
* Estimated Value: CAD 100,000.00
* Maximum Call-up Value: CAD 200,000.00
* Typical Call-up Value: CAD 10,000.00 - 150,000.00

**Firms Eligible to Submit Proposals**
Firms are invited to submit their proposals for the following roles:

* Senior Project Manager
* Senior Geotechnical Engineer
* Senior Environmental Scientific Advisor
* Total Classification Rate

**Submission Guidelines**
Bidding Documents are available on merx.com. Firms are invited to submit Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System. The deadline for submission is November 16th, 14:00:00 ET.

**Rickama award by**
The contract will be awarded based on the established criteria in the RFAP. Contract award results will be available on the DCC Website: Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada.

**Privacy**
Please note that the MERX Electronic Bidding System may have fees associated with it. For more information on fees, please visit: https://www.merx.com/public/pricing. If you are unsure about any part of the submission process, please contact Craig Patterson at 613-794-5311.
